values.heading: SAFETY AND SUSTAINABILITY
values.text: Many cleaning companies sacrifice their profit for your health. We believe as a company that provides cleaning services that it is our duty to keep your workplace environment as healthy and clean as possible.

values.heading: KNOWLEDGE
values.text: Your current cleaning company could be doing more harm to your facility without even knowning it. It requires knowledge to know what cleaning products to use for what given job.

values.heading: COMMITMENT
values.text: We are commited to never sacrifice your health for our profit. ISA is commited to keeping our employees and your facility as safe as possible.
